speakers.name: zx9
speakers.description: Upgrade your sound system with the all new ZX9 active speaker. It’s a bookshelf speaker system that offers truly wireless connectivity -- creating new possibilities for more pleasing and practical audio setups.

speakers.name: zx7
speakers.description: Stream high quality sound wirelessly with minimal to no loss. The ZX7 speaker uses high-end audiophile components that represents the top of the line powered speakers for home or studio use.
